en: Beauford Delaney sketchbook circa 1950s. Contains to-do lists, addresses, and appointment reminders. Contains ink sketches of abstract shapes, biomorphic portraits, anatomical studies, and expressionistic landscapes.

seo.title: Beauford Delaney sketchbook, book 31 - Beauford Delaney Notebooks and Sketchbooks
seo.description: Beauford Delaney sketchbook circa 1950s. Contains to-do lists, addresses, and appointment reminders. Contains ink sketches of abstract shapes, biomorphic portraits, anatomical studies, and expressionistic landscapes.
